about_the_game:
Improvise, Adapt, Overcome!

Take command, marine! Watch your forward operating base grow as you prepare for relentless waves of enemies in a thrilling mix of modern military vehicular combat and tower defense.

With BlitzPoint, we’ve streamlined classic strategy mechanics and infused them with action-packed defense gameplay. Build your base during the day, fortify it with turrets, tanks, and artillery, then unleash their firepower at night.

Can you balance your resources to dominate the battlefield? Will you rely on Humvees and Bradleys, bolster your air defenses with Apaches, or trust in precision artillery strikes? It’s going to be a brutal fight, but nothing beats seeing your base stand tall after the final wave.

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of war, and war related violence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 @ 3,3 GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 670
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 @ 3,2 GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1060 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: A minimalist modern military strategy tower defense game where you build and defend a forward operating base. Strategically place defenses, manage resources, and repel relentless waves of enemies. Build by day, defend by night, and command your forces in fast-paced, action-packed gameplay.
